page.title: 05Medical
page.content: {Medical}The{Fenwick Hosptial}has{24 {beds 14}for minor operations and{10 for {mothers.}There are{10 cots.}the Day Centre takes about {15 old people {per day}( it is like an old people's nursery school.> A{physiotherapy {centre}helps people who have hurt their limbs or backs. {THE SURGERY. {There are 4 doctors}at the surgery in Pemberton RD and they look after about {5,000 }people. if a person is ill they see the doctors first or the doctors make plans for a special person to see them. The local doctors provide{medicine }to stop things happening. They also work in the Fenwick{Hospital. }The area covered is Lyndhurst, Fritham, Bramshaw, Bartley, Woodlands, Ashurst, Beaulieu Road Station, New Park Manor, and Gritnam. {THE DENTIST}in Romsey Rd. cares for peoples teeth he tells the right foods
